REST in peace, long live GraphQL

  1. Introduce
  2. Last year using and exprimenting: query language for APIs called GraphQL
  3. Sharing: Knowledge of the technology
  4. And Sharing: Why it's a strong contender for new projects and breathing new life into existing projects at Neontribe

What is GraphQL?

  • A query language for your API
  • A server-side runtime for executing queries

A front for your business logic

  1. When talking about GraphQL referring to two separate things
  2. Query a way of retrieving data or mutating (updating) data
  3. Runtime a way of resolving a query into data

Schema


              type Customer {
                id: Integer
                name: String
                orders: [Order]
              }

              type Order {
                id: Integer
                product: Product
              }

              type Product {
                id: Integer
                price: Integer
                description: String
              }

Querying


              query {
                customers {
                  name
                }
              }
            

                SELECT `example`.`foo`...
  1. Like SQL for APIs?
  2. Understanding of your entities and their relations You'll have a hard time writing anything if you don't
